duties_responsibilities.duty: Designing and deploying high performance, fault-tolerant distributed search systems for Amazon websites worldwide.
Maximizing the quality and effectiveness of the search experience for visitors to Amazon websites worldwide.
Innovating and evaluating ranking at Amazon Search by creating infrastructure and metrics, enabling new experimental methods, and conducting proof-of-concept experiments.
Building search ranking systems and evaluation framework that extend to Amazon scale.
Analyzing data from recent A/B tests and guiding teams on best practices for improving search ranking systems.
Communicating and collaborating with business and tech leaders at Amazon to communicate initiatives and strategies.

education_certification.credential: PhD, or Master's degree and 4+ years of experience in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Machine Learning, or related field.
